data.message:
On cassette????
Lucky I've got a player, isn't it?!
I can't fuckin wait, Slim!
I also can't stop watching Phenomenon!
Loving John's cameo, btw!
When you comin to rescue me Bro!
My little South Paw needs a father figure! 
His dickhead dad stole my kids! Can't get them back without some gravitas!
& you, my twin, can get me a fine solicitor, after we've had a Camberwell Carrot!
Please help me & I promise to add another Brigade to your cause! 
Miss you, kiss you, bliss
3773 X
;)
